README.html.keywords: Bonyan Overview Bonyan is a blueprint for .NET Core aimed at simplifying the process of creating microservice projects. It provides a solid foundation using Clean Architecture and Domain-Driven Design (DDD), making it easy for developers to structure and scale their applications effectively. ğŸ› ï¸ Project Information Version: 1.0.0 Author: AkbarAhmadiSaray License: MIT Status: In Development Written in: .NET Core 8, Clean Architecture, DDD Architecture ğŸš€ Key Features âœ… Microservice Template: Predefined structure and architecture for building microservices using .NET Core. âœ… Clean Architecture: Enforces separation of concerns, making the project maintainable and scalable. âœ… Domain-Driven Design (DDD): Provides a clear focus on business logic, reducing technical debt and improving collaboration with domain experts. âœ… Plug-and-Play Components: Easily integrate additional services or components following the existing architecture. ğŸ”§ Tech Stack & Tools Languages: C# Frameworks: .NET Core 8 Architectures: Clean Architecture Domain-Driven Design (DDD) Tools: Visual Studio GitHub Actions for CI/CD Docker for containerization ğŸ·ï¸ Versioning This project follows Semantic Versioning to ensure consistent and predictable version updates. Version numbers are in the format of MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH. MAJOR: Significant changes or incompatible API updates. MINOR: Backward-compatible new features. PATCH: Bug fixes and other backward-compatible improvements.
